Class ResponseCurve.Cubic

java.lang.Object

public static class ResponseCurve.Cubic extends Object implements ResponseCurve.Function
Cubic implements a cubic equation of the standard form ax^3 + bx^2 + cx + d

      public double slope(double x)
      Description copied from interface: ResponseCurve.Function
      Evalutes the slope of a function at a given value, must never error. Discontinuities should be either 0 or DOUBLE_MAX.

    • signValid

      public boolean signValid()
      Description copied from interface: ResponseCurve.Function
      An intrinsic property of a given function, returns true if the function is valid below zero, false if it is not. Note that the function may be defined below zero, this is whether it is useful.
      Specified by:
      signValid in interface ResponseCurve.Function
      Returns:
      whether the function is valid negative.
